AuthoritarianismBook
  • Datasets in this package
  • Vignettes

Data reference version 0.1.0

Democracy scores or indexes

Numerical measures of the degree of democracy in particular countries.

All Democracy Scores Dataset

  • democracy

Extended Unified Democracy Scores (UDS)

  • extended_uds

The Lexical Index of Democracy, v. 3

  • lied

Selection from the POLITY IV dataset

  • polity_annual

A selection of indexes from the V-Dem dataset, version 6.1

  • vdem

Regime type datasets

Qualitative judgments about the type of regime in particular countries.

Selection from the Geddes, Wright, and Frantz Autocratic Regimes dataset

  • all_gwf

Selection from the Geddes, Wright, and Frantz Autocratic Regimes dataset

  • all_gwf_extended_yearly

Selection from the Geddes, Wright, and Frantz Autocratic Regimes dataset

  • all_gwf_periods

The Steffen Kailitz Dataset of Authoritarian Regime Types

  • kailitz_yearly

Selection from the Autocracies of the World dataset v. 1.0

  • magaloni

Selection from the Autocracies of the World dataset v. 1.0

  • magaloni_extended

A selection from the Authoritarian Regimes Data Set, v. 5.0

  • wahman_teorell

Regime institutions data

Information about particular regime institutions in different countries.

The Lexical Index of Democracy, v. 3

  • lied

Selection from the Political Institutions and Political Events (PIPE) dataset

  • PIPE

Selection from the POLITY IV dataset

  • polity_annual

Milan Svolik's Institutions in Dictatorship Dataset

  • svolik_institutions

Elections data

Information about elections in most countries of the world throughout their history.

A list of all elections in both the NELDA and the PIPE datasets.

  • all_elections

The NELDA v.4 dataset (selection)

  • nelda

Selection from the Political Institutions and Political Events (PIPE) dataset

  • PIPE

Constitutional data

Data about features of the constitutions of different countries throughout their history.

Mentions of democracy in constitutional documents, V. 1.0

  • democracy_mentions_yearly

Leader data

Information about the effective leaders of different regimes since the last century.

The Archigos dataset of political regimes, v. 4.1

  • archigos

Milan Svolik's Leaders in Dictatorship Dataset

  • svolik_leader

Personal power data

Measures of the degree of personal power of particular leaders in different regimes since the last century.

Latent variable index of personalism, v. 1.0

  • personal_scores

Violence and repression data

Data about war, state violence, and anti-regime campaigns in different regimes.

List of War Participants by Gleditsch.

  • all_war_participants_yearly

Fariss latent variable index of repression

  • fariss

List of Interstate War Dyads by Gleditsch

  • interstate_dyads_yearly

Selection from the NAVCO dataset v. 2.0

  • navco_2

Powell-Thyne coup data (V2015.09.30)

  • powell_thyne

Economic and demographic data

Combined GDP dataset

  • economic_data

Population of Independent States

  • population_data

Summary of the Standardized World Income Inequality Database

  • swiid_summary_5

Geographic data

Map data, useful for plotting.

World map data, in country-year format, for use with ggplot2.

  • world

Developed by Xavier Marquez.
